title: Document all environment variables
description:
Create comprehensive env var reference.

**Variables to document:**
- MOE_PROJECT_PATH
- MOE_TASK_ID
- MOE_WORKER_ID
- MOE_DAEMON_COMMAND
- MOE_NODE_COMMAND
- LOG_LEVEL (if logging task done)

**Location:** Add to MCP_SERVER.md or new docs/CONFIGURATION.md

implementationPlan.description: Create docs/CONFIGURATION.md with environment variables table (name, description, default, example). Use consistent markdown structure across all role files.
Document platform-specific notes for Windows, Mac, Linux. All agent docs in docs/agents/ directory.
Update MCP_SERVER.md to link to CONFIGURATION.md. Include mermaid diagrams for workflow visualization.
